title.rendered: TOZO T12 Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth Headphones Premium Fidelity Sound Quality Wireless Charging Case Digital LED…

content.rendered:
Read more

Ergonomic Design

The form of T12 completely matches the curve of internal contour of ear.

With spherical gentle silicone eartips, it may possibly supply extra carrying stability and luxury when in use.

Whether you’ re working or leaping, the earbuds will keep in ear securely.

Advanced Bluetooth 5.0 Technology

Support HSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCP. Provides in-call stereo sound.

Greatly enhance the transmission velocity and offering you with a low-latency listening expertise.

Hi-FI Stereo Sound Quality

TOZO acoustic specialists foucus on exact acoustic tuning and discover out one of the best sound traits for human listening to sensitivity.

Accurately modify each element to realize an ideal steadiness of bass, midrange and treble.

TOZO T12 present highly effective bass( lowest 20Hz), mellow midrange, and clear treble(as much as 20kHz). Reappearing each element of the music vividly.

Read more

Touch Control

Features with contact management sensors, TOZO T12 Headset can largely decrease the strain to your ears while you contact the panel for varied capabilities.

Tap as soon as on L/R panel to play/pause music and reply calls, double faucet to skip backward/ahead, triple faucet to get up Siri/Google Assistant, maintain to regulate the quantity.

Both Earbuds and Charging Case are IPX8 Waterproof Protection

IPX8 Waterproof Nano-coating effectively protects the earbuds and charging case from the injury of the splash by sweat and raindrops.

Earbuds and case even may be washed by water and cleaning soap.

No want to fret while you put on it whereas working,snowboarding, and so on. (not for swimming)

Upgraded Faster Wireless Charging

Enjoy quick charging, to completely cost the rechargerable case just one.5 hours through quick cost USB-C cable or 2 hours through wi-fi charger.

Playtime lasts for over 6 hours from single cost and complete 28 hours with charging case.

The charging case is suitable with most of wi-fi chargers.

Note: Wireless charger not included.

Also personal quick and steady transmission with out tangling.
【Touch Contro&Smart LED Digital Display】 Features with contact management sensors, TOZO T12 Headset can largely decrease the strain to your ears while you contact the button for varied capabilities. In Wireless Charging case, the good LED digital display can verify battery consumption show anytime.
【Comfortable Wearing, Premium Fidelity Stereo Sound Quality】TOZO T12 wi-fi earbuds are designed of curved in-ear by silicone earhooks, holding wi-fi Bluetooth headphones in place even throughout lively actions.TOZO T12 Offers a Truly Natural, Authentic Sound and Powerful Bass Performance with 10mm Large Size Speaker Driver- the drive space is 2.22 occasions than the traditional drive space.
【IPX8 waterproof】 Earbuds and charging case internal Nano-coating makes it attainable to waterproof for 1 meters deep for half-hour. It is appropriate for sports activities to stop water. Ideal for sweating it out on the health club . Even Wash the earbuds and base.
[Charge on the go] Playtime lasts for over 6 hours from single cost and complete 28 hours with charging case.
